verses.verse: And they <S%G2064>came<s%> over to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5561>country<s%> of the <S%G1046>Gadarenes.<s%>

And when he was <S%G1831>come<s%> out of the <S%G4143>ship,<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> there <S%G528>met<s%> him out of the <S%G3419>tombs<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> with an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%>

<S%G3739>Who<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> his <S%G2731>dwelling<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G3419>tombs;<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G1210>bind<s%> him, <S%G3777>no,<s%> not with <S%G254>chains:<s%>

<S%G1223>Because<s%> that he had been <S%G4178>often<s%> <S%G1210>bound<s%> with <S%G3976>fetters<s%> and <S%G254>chains,<s%> and the <S%G254>chains<s%> had been <S%G1288>plucked<s%> <S%G1288>asunder<s%> by him, and the <S%G3976>fetters<s%> <S%G4937>broken<s%> in pieces: <S%G2532>neither<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G2480>could<s%> <S%G3762>any<s%> man <S%G1150>tame<s%> him.

And <S%G1275>always,<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> and <S%G2250>day,<s%> he was in the <S%G3735>mountains,<s%> and in the <S%G3418>tombs,<s%> <S%G2896>crying,<s%> and <S%G2629>cutting<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> with <S%G3037>stones.<s%>
But when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3113>afar<s%> <S%G575>off,<s%> he <S%G5143>ran<s%> and <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> him,

And <S%G2896>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> have I to do with you, <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> you <S%G5207>Son<s%> of the <S%G5310>most<s%> <S%G5310>high<s%> <S%G2316>God?<s%> I <S%G3726>adjure<s%> you by <S%G2316>God,<s%> that you <S%G928>torment<s%> me not.
For he <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1831>Come<s%> out of the man, <S%G444><s%> you <S%G169>unclean<s%> spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

And he <S%G1905>asked<s%> him, What <S%G5101><s%> is your name? <S%G3686><s%> And he <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> My <S%G3686>name<s%> is <S%G3003>Legion:<s%> for we are <S%G4183>many.<s%>
And he <S%G3870>sought<s%> him <S%G4183>much<s%> that he would not <S%G649>send<s%> them <S%G649>away<s%> out of the <S%G5561>country.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> was there <S%G4314>near<s%> to the <S%G3735>mountains<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G5519>swine<s%> <S%G1006>feeding.<s%>

And <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1142>devils<s%> <S%G3870>sought<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3992>Send<s%> us <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5519>swine,<s%> that we may <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> them.

And <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2010>gave<s%> them <S%G2010>leave.<s%> And the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out, and <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5519>swine:<s%> and the <S%G34>herd<s%> <S%G3729>ran<s%> violently <S%G2596>down<s%> a <S%G2911>steep<s%> place <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> (they were <S%G5613>about<s%> <S%G1367>two<s%> <S%G1367>thousand;<s%>) and were <S%G4155>choked<s%> in the <S%G2281>sea.<s%>

And they that <S%G1006>fed<s%> the <S%G5519>swine<s%> <S%G5343>fled,<s%> and <S%G312>told<s%> it in the <S%G4172>city,<s%> and in the <S%G68>country.<s%> And they <S%G1831>went<s%> out to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> it was that was <S%G1096>done.<s%>

And they <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G2334>see<s%> him that was <S%G1139>possessed<s%> with the <S%G1139>devil,<s%> and <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G3003>legion,<s%> <S%G2521>sitting,<s%> and <S%G2439>clothed,<s%> and in his <S%G4993>right<s%> <S%G4993>mind:<s%> and they were <S%G5399>afraid.<s%>

And they that <S%G1492>saw<s%> it <S%G1334>told<s%> them <S%G4459>how<s%> it <S%G1096>befell<s%> to him that was <S%G1139>possessed<s%> with the <S%G1139>devil,<s%> and also <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G5519>swine.<s%>
And they <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3870>pray<s%> him to <S%G565>depart<s%> out of their <S%G3725>coasts.<s%>
And when he was <S%G1684>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4143>ship,<s%> he that had been <S%G1139>possessed<s%> with the <S%G1139>devil<s%> <S%G3870>prayed<s%> him that he might be with him.

However, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G863>suffered<s%> him not, but <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G5217>Go<s%> <S%G3624>home<s%> to your <S%G4674>friends,<s%> and <S%G312>tell<s%> them <S%G3745>how<s%> <S%G3745>great<s%> things the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> has <S%G4160>done<s%> for you, and has had <S%G1653>compassion<s%> on you.

And he <S%G565>departed,<s%> and <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2784>publish<s%> in <S%G1179>Decapolis<s%> <S%G3745>how<s%> <S%G3745>great<s%> things <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G4160>done<s%> for him: and <S%G3956>all<s%> men did <S%G2296>marvel.<s%>

And when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G1276>passed<s%> <S%G1276>over<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> by <S%G4143>ship<s%> to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side,<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G4863>gathered<s%> to him: and he was <S%G3844>near<s%> to the <S%G2281>sea.<s%>

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G752>rulers<s%> of the <S%G752>synagogue,<s%> <S%G2383>Jairus<s%> by <S%G3686>name;<s%> and when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> him, he <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> his <S%G4228>feet,<s%>

And <S%G3870>sought<s%> him <S%G4183>greatly,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> My <S%G2365>little<s%> <S%G2365>daughter<s%> <S%G2192>lies<s%> at the <S%G2079>point<s%> of <S%G2079>death:<s%> I pray you, <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G2007>lay<s%> your <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G2007>on<s%> her, that she may be <S%G4982>healed;<s%> and she shall <S%G2198>live.<s%>
And Jesus <S%G565>went<s%> with him; and <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> him, and <S%G4918>thronged<s%> him.
And a certain <S%G1135>woman,<s%> which <S%G1510>had<s%> an <S%G4511>issue<s%> of <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2094>years,<s%>

And had <S%G3958>suffered<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> things of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2395>physicians,<s%> and had <S%G1159>spent<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that she <S%G3844>had,<s%> and was <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G5623>bettered,<s%> but <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2064>grew<s%> <S%G5501>worse,<s%>
When she had <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> in the <S%G3793>press<s%> <S%G3693>behind,<s%> and <S%G680>touched<s%> his <S%G2440>garment.<s%>
For she <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2579>If<s%> I may <S%G680>touch<s%> but his <S%G2440>clothes,<s%> I shall be <S%G4982>whole.<s%>

And <S%G2112>straightway<s%> the <S%G4077>fountain<s%> of her <S%G129>blood<s%> was <S%G3583>dried<s%> up; and she <S%G1097>felt<s%> in her <S%G4983>body<s%> that she was <S%G2390>healed<s%> of that <S%G3148>plague.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G1921>knowing<s%> in <S%G1438>himself<s%> that <S%G1411>virtue<s%> had <S%G1831>gone<s%> out of him, <S%G1994>turned<s%> him <S%G1994>about<s%> in the <S%G3793>press,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G680>touched<s%> my clothes? <S%G2440><s%>
And his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, You <S%G991>see<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G4918>thronging<s%> you, and <S%G3004>say<s%> you, <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G680>touched<s%> me?
And he <S%G4017>looked<s%> <S%G4017>round<s%> <S%G4017>about<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> her that had <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> thing.

But the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G5399>fearing<s%> and <S%G5141>trembling,<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> was <S%G1096>done<s%> in her, <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G4363>fell<s%> down <S%G4363>before<s%> him, and <S%G2036>told<s%> him <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to her, <S%G2364>Daughter,<s%> your <S%G4102>faith<s%> has <S%G4982>made<s%> you <S%G4982>whole;<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> in <S%G1515>peace,<s%> and be <S%G5199>whole<s%> of your plague. <S%G3148><s%>

While he <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G2980>spoke,<s%> there <S%G2064>came<s%> from the <S%G752>ruler<s%> of the <S%G752>synagogue's<s%> house certain which <S%G3004>said,<s%> Your <S%G2364>daughter<s%> is <S%G599>dead:<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G4660>trouble<s%> you the <S%G1320>Master<s%> <S%G2089>any<s%> <S%G2089>further?<s%>

As <S%G2112>soon<s%> as <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> that was <S%G2980>spoken,<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G752>ruler<s%> of the <S%G752>synagogue,<s%> Be not <S%G5399>afraid,<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> believe. <S%G4100><s%>

And he <S%G863>suffered<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> to <S%G4870>follow<s%> him, <S%G1508>save<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> and <S%G2385>James,<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G2385>James.<s%>

And he <S%G2064>comes<s%> to the <S%G3624>house<s%> of the <S%G752>ruler<s%> of the <S%G752>synagogue,<s%> and <S%G2334>sees<s%> the <S%G2351>tumult,<s%> and them that <S%G2799>wept<s%> and <S%G214>wailed<s%> <S%G4183>greatly.<s%>

And when he was <S%G1525>come<s%> in, he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>Why<s%> <S%G2350>make<s%> you this <S%G2350>ado,<s%> and <S%G2799>weep?<s%> the <S%G3813>damsel<s%> is not <S%G599>dead,<s%> but sleeps. <S%G2518><s%>

And they <S%G2606>laughed<s%> him to <S%G2606>scorn.<s%> But when he had <S%G1544>put<s%> them <S%G537>all<s%> out, he <S%G3880>takes<s%> the <S%G3962>father<s%> and the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of the <S%G3813>damsel,<s%> and them that were with him, and <S%G1531>enters<s%> in <S%G3699>where<s%> the <S%G3813>damsel<s%> was <S%G345>lying.<s%>

And he <S%G2902>took<s%> the <S%G3813>damsel<s%> by the <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, <S%G5008>Talitha<s%> cumi; <S%G2891><s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is, being <S%G3177>interpreted,<s%> <S%G2877>Damsel,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1453>arise.<s%>

And <S%G2112>straightway<s%> the <S%G2877>damsel<s%> <S%G450>arose,<s%> and <S%G4043>walked;<s%> for she was of the age of <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%> And they were <S%G1839>astonished<s%> with a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1611>astonishment.<s%>

And he <S%G1291>charged<s%> them <S%G4183>straightly<s%> that <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man<s%> should <S%G1097>know<s%> it; and <S%G2036>commanded<s%> that something should be <S%G1325>given<s%> her to <S%G5315>eat.<s%>
